span.strong: Priority Charter Schools are open-enrollment charter schools. As such, all PCS campuses are free public schools that have the flexibility to adapt to the educational needs of individual students. PCS serves a wide range of students that range from talented and gifted to students who need extra help to get to grade level. That is why PCS is different from the one-size-fits-all traditional public school.

h5.span: Now accepting applications for returning students for

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12

div.div: Parents will need to provide the following:
•Birth Certificate •Proof of Residency •Drivers License of Enrolling Parent/Guardian •Immunization Record •Social Security Card of Enrolling Student

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12

div.div: To register returning students, create a profile on our parent portal here. Once your application is received by the selected campus, we will contact you to complete the registration process.

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12

div.div: •Valid Driver's License •Proof of Liability Insurance •Required Immunizations •Physical Education Mandate
